roleset.name: block a biological process or function

example.name: abrogate-v: active use
example.text: Cleavage site mutations in the encephalomyocarditis virus P3 region lethally abrogate the normal processing cascade .

propbank.arg: Cleavage site mutations in the encephalomyocarditis virus P3 region

example.name: abrogate-v: with agent
example.text: By treating cells with RUNX2 siRNA , we abrogated the Wip1 - dependent activation of Bax expression and the cells sensitization to cis - platin .

propbank.arg: By treating cells with RUNX2 siRNA
the Wip1 - dependent activation of Bax expression and the cells sensitization to cis - platin

example.name: abrogation-n
example.text: Abrogation of TGF beta signaling in mammary carcinomas recruits Gr-1+CD11b+ myeloid cells that promote metastasis .

roleset.note: ABROGATE-V NOTES: Created for Bio-AMR annotations. No VN, FN class.
